description:
Explore a land filled with lost legends, ancient powers, and ferocious monsters in TUNIC, an isometric action game
about a small fox on a big adventure. Stranded on a mysterious beach, armed with only your own curiosity, you will
confront colossal beasts, collect strange and powerful items, and unravel long-lost secrets. Be brave, tiny fox!

4.1.0.description:
# Breakable Objects & Bugfixes
### Backwards compatibility with existing seeds: 
- Archipelago: ✅
- Single player: ❌

### Breakable Object Shuffle (by @ScipioWright)
- Similar to grass rando but on a smaller scale, this option takes a majority of the generic breakable objects in the game (pots, boxes, barrels, signs, bombable walls, etc.) and assigns items to them. Adds around 260 checks, or around 300 with entrance rando.

### Tunic apworld/Archipelago changes:
- Added Breakable Shuffle to AP
- The Torch can now be added to start_inventory in your yaml file
- Hexagon Quest ability thresholds are now listed in the AP-generated spoiler log
- Renamed the `grass_fill` option to `local_fill`, which can now be used even if grass rando is turned off.
  - If breakable shuffle is on, this will default to 40 if left default. Grass rando still defaults to 95.
  - Reduced max local fill value from 100 to 98 to avoid possible fill errors when set to 100.
- Various logic fixes, etc
- The world/yaml settings that are displayed when connecting to an AP game can now be hidden.
- Updated Archipelago.MulitClient.Net to the latest version (6.5.0)

### Entrance Tracker File
- The rando now populates a file (.csv format) as you play showing the entrances you've gone through and where they connect.
- You can find it under Randomizer Settings -> Hint Settings -> Open Entrance Tracker

### Bugfixes
- Addressed an issue when entering AP connection info where the main menu buttons would become unresponsive.
- Fixed certain parts of the title screen windows being cutoff on steam deck & lower resolutions.
- Fixed an issue in enemy rando where the East Forest boss hp bar could become stuck on screen after leaving the room.
- Fixed a few spots where turrets could spawn and block the player in enemy rando.
- The shotgun will no longer inflict self damage when the fox is tiny.
- Addressed some issues with the fairy seeking spell.
- Arachnophobia mode now applies to the enemies thrown out by boss scavenger (enemy rando).
- Added a toggle under Other Settings to stop the game from running in background
4.1.0.title: Tunic Randomizer 4.1.0

4.1.1.description:
# 4.1.0 Hotfix

- Fixed a bug with the fairy seeking spell that was causing instability on the [4.1.0 release](https://github.com/silent-destroyer/tunic-randomizer/releases/tag/4.1.0).
4.1.1.title: Tunic Randomizer 4.1.1

4.1.2.description:
# More Bugfixes
**Edit 2/10/2025:** Uploaded a new tunic.apworld with bugfixes for combat logic and breakable shuffle.

Compatible with all seeds started on [4.1.0+](https://github.com/silent-destroyer/tunic-randomizer/releases/tag/4.1.0) or any Archipelago game started on AP 0.5.1+.
- Fixed a bug with the entrance tracker file (& files in general) being accessed by the mod while locked/in use by another program.
- Fixed a bug that would result in a black screen if you quit to title screen during The Heir fight.
- Fixed a bug with ladder shuffle not working properly if you switched to nighttime.

For instructions on installing, [see the README](https://github.com/silent-destroyer/tunic-randomizer?tab=readme-ov-file#installation)
4.1.2.title: Tunic Randomizer 4.1.2

4.2.0.description:
# The latest bells and ~~whistles~~ fuses

### Backwards compatibility with existing seeds: 
- Archipelago: ✅
- Single player: ❌

## Shuffle Fuses
- Turns all of the fuses into items that, when found, will restore power to that particular fuse/power line.
  - Finding a fuse item will immediately register that fuse as having power, regardless of if the physical fuse itself has been activated/prayed to.
    - If the fuse is part of a series of fuses, all previous fuses on the path must also be found for it to be fully powered. (Ex. Finding the fuse outside of the Cathedral will not immediately open the Cathedral unless the other two Swamp fuses have also been found)
  - Praying at a fuse will instead count as a check, and does not affect the power. Fuses that are not the first in a sequence of fuses still require power from finding the fuse items in order to activate their checks,
- With this mode, certain areas can become logically accessible in ways they couldn't before, such as entering Ziggurat or Library via the teleporters, or entering Cathedral without Laurels or Prayer.

## Shuffle Bells
- Turns the East and West Bells into items that must be found in order to open the Sealed Temple. Ringing the bells counts as checks.

## Archipelago Updates
### Trap Link (by @ScipioWright)
- Send a trap back to other players when you receive a Fool Trap. Anyone else that is playing at the same time with Trap Link enabled will receive the same trap as the player who sent it (or a similar trap where applicable if not playing Tunic).

### tunic.apworld changes
- Added the options for shuffled fuses and shuffled bells to the apworld/yaml.
- Various logic bugfixes.

### Archipelago-specific fixes
- Coin toss checks done while disconnected from Archipelago will now be marked to send on next reconnect.
- Fixed a bug where siege engine would get stuck during the death cutscene if the item on his head was already collected.
- Previously processed items are now skipped instantly when re-connecting to an in progress Archipelago save.
  - This was mostly only noticeable with grass rando, where it would sometimes take a long time to start receiving items again after loading into the game.
- Updated Archipelago.MultiClient.Net to 6.6.0
 
## Enemy Randomizer Updates
### Random Enemy Sizes
- Randomly scales enemy size up or down (from 0.25x to 1.75x).
- This option is global and works regardless of if the enemy rando is enabled or not.

### Extra Enemies
- The "Extra Enemies" option is now global and works even if randomized enemies are disabled. If enemies aren't randomized it will enable NG+ and nighttime enemies that appear throughout the game.

## Misc Changes
- Interacting with The Heir for the first time with all pages will now prompt you to choose an ending, instead of forcing the good ending.
- Added a new fool trap type 🔄
- Gave Terry a hat on his birthday 🎉
- Another thing in a place somewhere probably

## Known Issues
- The game may sometimes crash immediately upon defeating The Heir. There currently isn't a known cause or fix for this.
- Single Player Entrance Randomizer may produce unbeatable seeds
4.2.0.title: Tunic Randomizer 4.2.0

4.2.1.description:
# Entrance Rando Bugfix
### Backwards compatibility with existing seeds: 
- Archipelago: ✅
- Single player: ❌

# Changes
- Fixed a bug with Entrance Rando in the Single Player randomizer that could cause unbeatable seeds.
- Added new ghost fox spawns in Quarry and Lower Ziggurat (entrance rando). (by @ScipioWright)
4.2.1.title: Tunic Randomizer 4.2.1

4.2.2.description:
### Backwards compatibility with existing seeds: 
- Archipelago: ✅
- Single player: ❌

# Changes
- Fixed a bug with the fairy seeking spell that was accidentally introduced in Version 4.2.0. (@ScipioWright)
- Single Player Randomizer: Fixed a bug that could cause inaccurate logic if a non-hexagon quest seed was played after a hexagon quest seed in the same session.
- Archipelago: Added Trap Link conversions for more non-Tunic trap types. (@ScipioWright)
4.2.2.title: Tunic Randomizer 4.2.2

4.2.3.description:
### Backwards compatibility with existing seeds: 
- Archipelago: ✅
  - The tunic.apworld file was updated in this version.
- Single player: ✅(4.2.2 only)

## Changes
- Removed the softlock-escape teleporters in ziggurat/library with shuffled fuses. Players will simply be given the Torch instead.
  - These ended up just being more confusing than they were helpful and with too many edge cases to make them worth maintaining.

## tunic.apworld changes
- Fuse shuffle: Cathedral Elevator fuse no longer marked as progression if entrance rando is on.
- Adjusted rules for being able to pray at Atoll/Swamp fuses to match between fuse shuffle and non-fuse shuffle

## Known Issues
- Entrance rando might not guarantee all rooms to be accessible in the single player rando, and in rare cases the heir might not be reachable. It is recommended to use Archipelago for entrance rando until the next release.
4.2.3.title: Tunic Randomizer 4.2.3

4.2.4.description:
### Backwards compatibility with existing seeds: 
- Archipelago: ✅
  - The tunic apworld has been updated in this version.
- Single player: ❌

# Changes
- Fixed a bug with entrance rando in the single player randomizer. (@ScipioWright)
- Added compatibility with more non-Tunic trap types for Archipelago Trap Link (including Celeste's Zoom and Bald traps). (@ScipioWright)
  - One of those traps might have snuck its way into the normal trap pool as well...
- Added a camera zoom slider when using the fox texture editor.
- Fixed the bush chopping sfx playing everytime you enter the overworld if you had `Clear Early Bushes` turned on.
  
## tunic apworld changes
- ~~Added support for universal tracker's poptracker integration. (@ScipioWright)~~ Some issues were reported with this functionality, we're looking into it!
4.2.4.title: Tunic Randomizer 4.2.4

4.2.5.description:
### Backwards compatibility with existing seeds: 
- Archipelago: ✅
  - The tunic apworld was updated in this version.
- Single player: ❌

# Changes
- Performance improvements when playing grass rando. (#116)
- Fixed a white screen bug with the single player entrance rando. (#118)
- Randomized enemy sizes are now affected by the seeded enemies setting.
- The tunic apworld should now properly work with the universal tracker poptracker integration.
4.2.5.title: Tunic Randomizer 4.2.5

4.2.6.description:
### Backwards compatibility with existing seeds: 
- Archipelago: ✅
- Single player: ✅

# Changes
- Added support for auto-tracking on the [Entrance Tracker website](https://scipiowright.gitlab.io/tunic-tracker/).
  - Auto-tracking only works for Archipelago, but the EntranceTracker.csv file created by the mod can now also be uploaded to the site to sync entrances for single player/non-archipelago seeds.
- Fixed a bug with the zoom trap and trap link (#120 @ScipioWright)
4.2.6.title: Tunic Randomizer 4.2.6

4.2.7.description:
### Backwards compatibility with existing seeds: 
- Multiworlds: ✅
  - The tunic.apworld file was updated in this version.
- Single player: ❌

# Changes
- Fixed a bug where the ending stats screen would show glitched text if grass rando is on
- Fixed an issue where the game would stop receiving items if an incoming item had invalid location data
- Fixed an entrance rando logic bug (single player) [#124 @ScipioWright]
- Fixed a bug where the "fewer shops" entrance rando setting wouldn't apply to a copied seed+settings string
- Minor bugfixes in the tunic.apworld
4.2.7.title: Tunic Randomizer 4.2.7
